actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of August 13, 1946, to increase the Federal contribution to 90 percent of the cost of shore restoration and protection projects.

summary.text: Increases the maximum allowable Federal contribution to States and localities for shore restoration projects to 90 percent of the project cost.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of August 13, 1946, to increase the Federal contribution to 90 percent of the cost of shore restoration and protection projects.
